page.title: 10SCHOOL GAMES IN LYNSTED
page.content: We play{sticky-glue}at school. Somebody has to be 'IT'. You make up a 'HOME' base like the school fence or a bench. The person who is It has to touch the others. If you are touched you have to stand in a starshape, still as a statue with your legs open. To free someone you have to crawl between their legs. People used to play this game a lot. It is a very famous game. Even the Infants play it. Another game is called{Filmstars.} Caroline Golding made it up. One person thinks of the initials of a filmstar. The others stand in a line 3 metres away. The first person to run up and give the right answer wins. If you arrive at the same time as someone else you guess a colour. To make it harder you can run there & back & back again. This means you have to guess well & run fast!
